title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
annotation: A novel about the American dream and the disillusionment that comes with it.

author: George Orwell
annotation: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
annotation: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality, seen through the eyes of a child.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
annotation: A romantic novel that critiques the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
annotation: A story about teenage angst and alienation, narrated by the iconic Holden Caulfield.
